resources.string: you need to sleep, That\'s the thing I made when making this app. This app is meant to remind you, even when we\'re being chased by multiple deadlines we need to sleep. Set a bedtime in between your work to make sure you get enough sleep

tips to sleep:

1. stop playing smartphone
2. Brush your teeth before going to bed
3. drink warm milk
4. clean your bed
5. just close your eyes
